page.title: 03 EDUCATION COMMUNITY HOME
page.content: Meadowcroft is a community home with education provided. It provides for pregnant girls who can't be looked after because of extreme behaviour.There are 36 girls and about 60 staff which includes social workers,teachers,supervisors and nursery nurses. The girls take"O"levels and CSE's like normal girls.It is situated on Pope lane,Whitestake,Preston.Their are 3 stages to the school,Lindle,the main school and the Hostel. Their are eight lessons a day,3 in the morning,3 in the afternoon and 2 in the evening.An intergrated programme, educational,medical,social,vocational and recreational. We chose this subject because it is in the area,it is the only one of its kind in the country and my parents work there.
